Pure sea water absorption and scattering. Based on:
250-550 nm: Mason et al. 2016. Appl. Optics 55(25), 7163-7172.
555-725 nm: R.M. Pope and E.S. Fry, 1997. Appl. Optics 36(33), 8710-8723.
725-800 nm: R.C. Smith and K. Baker, 1981. Appl. Optics 20(2), 177-184.
800-2000nm: D. Segelstein, 1981. "The Complex Refrac. Index of Water", M.S. Thesis, U. Missouri
Measured absorption data were spline fit and resampled to 5 nm resolution.
Scattering coefs were computed from A. Morel, 1974. "Optical Aspects Oceanogr.," Chap 1 (L&WEq. 3.31)
https://figshare.com/articles/dataset/Pure_sea_water_absorption_and_scattering/12815750/2
wavelength    a            b        
  (nm)      (1/m)        (1/m)
